ssot__EngagementChannelTypeConsent__dlm.name: Engagement Channel Type Consent
ssot__EngagementChannelTypeConsent__dlm.description: The Engagement Channel Type Consent DMO represents an individual's consent preferences specific to a type of communication, such as email.

ssot__ConsentCaptureddateTime__c.description: The date and time when consent was captured.

ssot__ConsentCapturedSourceName__c.description: The location where consent was captured for an individual.

ssot__ConsentStatusId__c.description: A reference ID for an individual’s consent status, for example, opted out of data collection.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DataUsePurposeId__c.description: A reference ID to reason for contacting prospect or customer, for example billing, marketing, or surveys.

ssot__EffectiveFromDate__c.description: The date when consent form is in effect.

ssot__EffectiveToDate__c.description: The date when a consent form is no longer in effect.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to method of message delivery, for example and email or TV commercial.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Engagement Channel Type Consent DMO.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the engagement channel type.

ssot__PartyId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent party, for example, an individual, business, or affiliation group.

ssot__PartyRoleId__c.description: A reference ID to associated party role, for example, a customer, supplier, or competitor.
